body_html: With Tensors and Variables being merged soon, will we still keep a variable constructor for the next release, or would be instead provide a tensor constructor and we will rename all instances of variable with tensor?
body_text: With Tensors and Variables being merged soon, will we still keep a variable constructor for the next release, or would be instead provide a tensor constructor and we will rename all instances of variable with tensor?
body: With Tensors and Variables being merged soon, will we still keep a `variable` constructor for the next release, or would be instead provide a `tensor` constructor and we will rename all instances of `variable` with `tensor`?
